name: MyIllyBarista
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my illy barista
Developer Terms of Use
des:
illy is an Italian family-owned company that has been delighting coffee connoisseurs since 1933 with their wide selection of coffee, considered among the best in the world. Every day 7 million cups of illy coffee are enjoyed in a variety of different settings; in coffee shops, restaurants and hotels, in illy cafés, and of course at home.

Now, enjoying illy coffee at home just got easier. With My illy Barista, you can ask for suggestions on which coffee is best suited to you, go on a unique coffee tasting tour, and receive coffee recipes to discover new drinks.

- Ask illy to guide you through product selection
- Ask illy for suggestions on what coffee to order
- Ask illy to go on a coffee tasting tour
- Ask illy to send me a coffee recipe
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
